sentences.english: It's not a decision you'll regret, even if L.A. winds up losing in a blowout.
sentences.chinese: 即使快船被虐，你也不会后悔这个决定。

sentences.english: It was the first year my dad bought season tickets to the Clips.
sentences.chinese: 这是我爸第一次买快船的季票。

sentences.english: Corey Maggette scored 23 points and Tim Thomas had 20 for the Clippers.
sentences.chinese: 马盖蒂，托马斯为快船分别拿下了23及20分。

sentences.english: Rashad Mobley, Truth About It: The Clippers at the Wizards.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶快船对阵华盛顿奇才队。

sentences.english: We share it with the Clippers.
sentences.chinese: 我们和快船共用一个球馆。

sentences.english: The two in most interesting situations are Oden in Portland and Gordon with the Clippers.
sentences.chinese: 其中两个最有趣的是波特兰的奥登和快船的戈登。

sentences.english: If I were Yao, I would demand a trade to the Golden State Warriors or the Lakers or Clippers, or the Sonics.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是姚，我会交易到金州勇士或湖人或快船。

sentences.english: Clippers Vice President of Basketball Operations Elgin Baylor said.
sentences.chinese: 快船队篮球业务副总裁埃尔金贝勒说。

sentences.english: A game in Fresno against the Clippers would have been lucky to be that well-attended.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是在与快船的比赛中还是有很多人到场的。

sentences.english: The Clips have made 29 first-round picks since 1980.
sentences.chinese: 自1980年以来快船队拥有29个首轮选秀权。

sentences.english: James is expected to meet with the Miami Heat and the Los Angeles Clippers tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯预计将与迈阿密热火和洛杉矶快船队的明天。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
